verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> If יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <WH1961> been לָ֑נוּ יֹֽאמַר־ <WH559> say נָ֝א <WH4994> now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> who was on our side now may Israel
לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> If יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <WH1961> been לָ֑נוּ בְּק֖וּם <WH6965> rose up עָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH5921> against אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> who was on our side when men
אֲ֭זַי <WH233> Then חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> quick בְּלָע֑וּנוּ <WH1104> they had swallowed us up בַּחֲר֖וֹת <WH2734> was kindled אַפָּ֣ם <WH639> when their wrath בָּֽנוּ׃

אֲ֭זַי <WH233> Then הַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> the waters שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ <WH7857> had overwhelmed נַ֝֗חְלָה <WH5158> us the stream עָבַ֥ר <WH5674> had gone over עַל־ <WH5921> over נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH5315> our soul
אֲ֭זַי <WH233> Then עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> had gone over עַל־ <WH5921> over נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> our soul הַ֝מַּ֗יִם <WH4325> waters הַזֵּֽידוֹנִֽים׃ <WH2121> the proud
בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD שֶׁלֹּ֥א <WH3808> has not נְתָנָ֥נוּ <WH5414> who hath not given טֶ֝֗רֶף <WH2964> us [as] a prey לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH8127> to their teeth

נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ <WH5315> Our soul כְּצִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> as a bird נִמְלְטָה֮ <WH4422> is escaped מִפַּ֪ח <WH6341> out of the snare י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים <WH3369> of the fowlers הַפַּ֥ח <WH6341> the snare נִשְׁבָּ֗ר <WH7665> is broken וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃ <WH4422> and we are escaped
עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ <WH5828> Our help בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> [is] in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> who made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth
